doctor.name: Dr. Zia Hayder Bosunia
doctor.info: Dr. Zia Hayder Bosunia is a Liver Specialist in Rangpur. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS (Medicine), MD (Hepatology), ERCP. He is working as a Liver & Medicine Specialist doctor in Rangpur Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rangpur. Practicing hour of Dr. Zia Hayder Bosunia at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rangpur is 3pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).
